name: Hymble Ventures Alpha Test
description:
Hymble Ventures is a fast-paced, single player, platform game with environmental puzzles, explorative levels and unlockable unique abilities.

With your help in finding bugs and giving feedback, it will contribute a lot in improving the gameplay experience. 

Consider following our social media platforms for more updates and info on the game.

Twitter: @HymbleVentures

Discord server: https://discord.gg/Q69EJkAD

TikTok: @HymbleVentures
